recipetype.name: Breads, Muffins, & Scones
recipetype.ingredients: 1 cup sliced carrots (about 1 can (14.5 ounces) or 2 to 3 fresh carrots), ⅔ cup packed brown sugar, 1 egg, lightly beaten, 1 cup nonfat or 1% milk, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 2 cups baking mix (biscuit or pancake mix)

recipetype.name: Breakfast
recipetype.ingredients: 2 cups fruit, 2 cups nonfat or 1% milk, 6 ounces low-fat vanilla yogurt, 1 cup orange juice

recipetype.name: Desserts
recipetype.ingredients: 1 small butternut squash (about 1 pound), 3 medium tart apples [3” diameter], peeled and sliced, 2 Tablespoons lemon juice, ¾ cup packed brown sugar, 1 Tablespoon corn starch, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, ½ teaspoon salt

recipetype.name: Dinner
recipetype.ingredients: 1 cup chopped carrots (about 2 small), 1 cup chopped celery (about 2 stalks), 3 cups low sodium chicken broth (see notes), 3 tablespoons flour, 2 cups cooked chicken, bite sized, 1 cup frozen peas

recipetype.name: Dips, Salad Dressings, Salsas, & Sauces
recipetype.ingredients: ¼ cup cold water, 1 Tablespoon cornstarch, ⅓ cup sugar, 4 cups berries, fresh or frozen (blackberries, raspberries, blueberries, sliced strawberries or a mixture)
